original_text: beginning from the baptism of John until the day when he was taken up from us—one of these men must become with us a witness to his resurrection.”
korean_text: 항상 우리와 함께 다니던 사람 중에 하나를 세워 우리와 더불어 예수께서 부활하심을 증언할 사람이 되게 하여야 하리라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: beginning from the baptism of John
until the day when he was taken up from us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리에게서 올려져 가신 그 날까지

sentences.original_text: must become with us a witness
